ast.parser
Class AstNode

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--tools.AttributedNode
        |
        +--ast.parser.AstNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseType, Comment, ConstAst, DataType, FuncAst, ImportFile, OperatorAst, SegAst, StatAst, VarAccAst, VarAst
public abstract class AstNode
extends AttributedNode
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Base class of nodes of abstract syntax tree (AST). It recognizes ADAP intermediate format and outputs either intermediate and C code.

Overrides:
clone in class AttributedNode

InsertMeBefore

public void InsertMeBefore(AstNode n)
                    throws AssertionError
Insert myself before 'n' in its parent's children list. 'n' and later children are shifted down by 1.

InsertMeAfter

public void InsertMeAfter(AstNode n)
                   throws AssertionError
Insert myself after 'n' in its parent's children list. Children behind 'n' are shifted down by 1.
